survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based coffee delivery services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based coffee service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current subscription-based coffee service?

questions.question_text: Which features of your subscription service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional comments.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include a text input field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which features of your subscription service do you value the most? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your subscription coffee service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your subscription coffee service?

questions.question_text: How often do you receive deliveries from your coffee subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture unique delivery frequencies.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How often do you receive deliveries from your coffee subscription service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your coffee subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure likelihood of recommendation. This is a key metric for customer loyalty.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your coffee subscription service to others?
